name: Business Time!
description:
As a manager of my company your job is to fix any problems caused by employees, customers and suppliers. Also, make sure you take a good care of our customers and suppliers, as well as make sure our employees stay productive. Remember that I am your boss, I like money and more money. Work in my best interests and you can keep your job for another day. If you fail me, you're fired. Manage your time well and stay focused. 

Play by selecting an appropriate response option within a time limit. 

By 

Alt_Hypothesis
